subject: Wind Power Development Tutorial July 16-18 2007 Denver
body:

          Denver, CO

Wind Power is on a rocketing 25% growth curve across North America. Do you have the know-how to bring a wind farm to market and reap the rewards?




Media Sponsors:










• Learn the latest business models and get a detailed analysis
  of a 100MW project pro forma
• Learn how to structure your project to take full advantage of
  RECs, Production Tax Credits, and innovative
  financing vehicles
• Understand the key steps in the critical path for wind
  power: land rights, wind risk assessment, turbine cost and
  availability, grid-access, power pricing and bankable PPAs,
  and environmental permitting
• Hear about real-world challenges and successes encountered
  in wind projects in the US and Canada
• Design your project for the maximum possible value and
  identify the best exit strategies
• Get face-to-face access to the experts at the center of
  the deal flow 







Monday, July 16, 1-5pm
          A Timely Pre-Conference Workshop:

Developing Wind Power in Canada:
A Survey of the Financial
          and Other Conditions Unique
          to the Canadian Market
